import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import SearchBar from'./components/SearchBar';import ModelCard from'./components/ModelCard';import FilterSidebar from'./components/FilterSidebar';import ModelModal from'./components/ModelModal';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[models,setModels]=useState([]);const[filtered,setFiltered]=useState([]);const[selectedModel,setSelectedModel]=useState(null);const[learnedModels,setLearnedModels]=useState(()=>{return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('learnedModels'))||[];});const[darkMode,setDarkMode]=useState(false);const[resources,setResources]=useState([]);const[resourceMap,setResourceMap]=useState({});// üîß new lookup map
useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const modelRes=await fetch(process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/Complete_ML_AI.json');const resourceRes=await fetch(process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/resource_links.json');const modelData=await modelRes.json();const resourceData=await resourceRes.json();// üîß Build a quick lookup map where show === 'Y'
const visibleResources={};resourceData.forEach(r=>{if(r.show==='Y'){visibleResources[r.Algorithm]=r;}});setResources(resourceData);setResourceMap(visibleResources);// üîß Filter model list where Algorithm is in resourceMap
const filteredModels=modelData.filter(m=>visibleResources[m.Algorithm]);setModels(filteredModels);setFiltered(filteredModels);};fetchData();},[learnedModels]);const handleSearch=query=>{if(!query)return setFiltered(models);const q=query.toLowerCase();setFiltered(models.filter(m=>Object.values(m).some(val=>String(val).toLowerCase().includes(q))));};const toggleLearned=algorithm=>{const updated=learnedModels.includes(algorithm)?learnedModels.filter(item=>item!==algorithm):[...learnedModels,algorithm];setLearnedModels(updated);localStorage.setItem('learnedModels',JSON.stringify(updated));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:darkMode?'app dark':'app',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"topbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83E\uDDE0 AI/ML Model Explorer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setDarkMode(!darkMode),className:"toggle-mode",children:darkMode?'‚òÄÔ∏è Light Mode':'üåô Dark Mode'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Search, Filter, and Learn AI Models \u2013 for Students & Practitioners \uD83D\uDE80"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{onSearch:handleSearch})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"explorer-layout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FilterSidebar,{data:models,setFiltered:setFiltered})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"model-grid",children:filtered.map((model,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModelCard,{model:model,onClick:setSelectedModel,isLearned:learnedModels.includes(model.Algorithm),toggleLearned:toggleLearned},idx))})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModelModal,{model:selectedModel,onClose:()=>setSelectedModel(null),resources:resources})]});}export default App;
